amendment.description: Amendments en bloc offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart, comprised of the following amendments offered as En Bloc No. 2: 23, 24, 27, 30, 31, 34, 35, 40, 41, 42, 43, 45, 47, and 60 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart amendments (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A008) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Diaz-Balart amendments (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A008) offered by Mr. Diaz-Balart.
